segments.text: OK . Have you seen the samples ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I have . I'm interested in your underwear . If the price is acceptable we would like to order it soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad to hear that . We are trying to give you a favourable one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a bit more than I was prepared to pay .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too little . Well , I'll come down to 120 yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I go up to 115 yuan , but not a penny more . Is that acceptable ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you order more than 10,000 pieces , we can accept 115 yuan for each one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'll accept the price and place an order for 10,000 pieces .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . It's a pleasure to do business with you , Mrs . Phoebe .
segments.speaker: S2
